title: Tracking Maddox
description: [Siren Classic Erotic Alternative Paranormal Consensual BDSM Romance, M/M, werewolves, bondage, spanking, flogging, sex toys, HEA] Maddox Chambers knows the Black Forest very well. His family donated the land to the park service fifty years ago. Rumors of disappearances have surrounded the land for years. Determined to put those rumors and his stack of cold cases to bed, Maddox goes into the Black Forest alone. When an outsider is snared trespassing on wolf territory, pack leader Kade Ronan is forced into action. Kade knows that the only way to protect this stranger from the wild wolves, ready to tear him apart, is to claim him. Kade has always wanted a human submissive, but hasn't dared taking one on. With the opportunity before him, Kade decides to find out why the wolves in his pack are so obsessed with human lovers. Kade is a Dom who wants Maddox as his submissive. Will Maddox submit willingly to his protection or will he have to convince him to stay within his world? ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Tatum Throne
